description: Defines the baseline qualitative (Policy) and quantitative (Metric/Stability) constraints enforced by the GAX Axiomatics Agent during GSEP-C Stages S2, S3, and S6.5. This separates the static constraint ruleset from the dynamic Metric & Parameter Axiom Manifest (MPAM) and Policy Veto Logic Manifest (PVLM) state checks.

policy_prohibitions.rule: Evolution must not introduce or increase dependency on external non-certified third-party registries.
Evolution must not breach the hard-coded resource allocation ceiling (CPU/Memory/Disk I/O) defined in the system's runtime environment configuration.
